text: “apage deviyane! ‘obage deviyanva visvasa karanu’ yayi (apava) visvasaya desata aradhana kala ayage aradhanava niyata vasayenma api savan di, apida (e andamatama) visvasaya tæbuvemu. ebævin apage deviyane! oba apage væradi valata samava di, apage papayangen apava beragena (avasanayedi) honda aya samaga apava maranayata pat vimata salasvanu mænava!”
